{{Lang|'''Miss Ruoyu'''|zh=若雨女士|zh_rm=Ruòyǔ-nǚshì}} is the industry representative for [[Shenglu Hall]].

She is investigating the possibility of restarting the mining operations in [[The Chasm (Area)|The Chasm]].<ref>{{Ref/BB|Feiyun Slope Bulletin Board|Shenglu Hall Announcement}}</ref>
